segments.text: My eyes keep going back to that two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on it, reaching high into the 'COOKIE JAR.'
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It just looks so unstable, its legs seem to be tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel it teetering beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could go wrong very quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched to his limit, one hand reaching, the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height onto a hard floor would not be good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him doesn't seem to notice the immediate danger of the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just focused on the cookies, a future treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really getting anxious just watching it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stabilize that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a miracle it hasn't tipped already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a suspended moment before an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
